summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1322, for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue and Twenty-fourth Avenue produced north, from East Alder Street to East Cherry Street; East Cheery Street, from Twenty-fourth Avenue, as produced to Twenty-fifth Avenue; and Twenty-fifth Avenue, from East Alder Street to East Columbia Street, by constructing sewers, etc., under Ordinance No. 14968 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
